headline: Crews Wrap Up Winter Prep to Help Provide Safe and Reliable Power for FirstEnergy's West Virginia Customers
summary: With colder months expected to produce higher electric use, FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) electric companies Mon Power and Potomac Edison have completed inspections and maintenance across their West Virginia service areas to help support electric system reliability as temperatures drop this winter.
